h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
h2_title: How to Find Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
content: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top are located at the start of Bishui Cave. You'll need to find the Cooling Slope and defeat the Five Element Carts to gain access to the hidden area.
promot:

Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top are located at the start of Bishui Cave. You'll need to find the Cooling Slope and defeat the Five Element Carts to gain access to the hidden area.
